Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.connection.socket.server

Class ServerHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.connection.socket.server.ServerHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ServerHandler extends Object implements Runnable
This class handles the server-side logic for a client connection.
